info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 5:04PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Rutherford, southwestern Cleveland and north central Cherokee Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 504 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles south of Forest City, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Forest City, Boiling Springs NC, Ellenboro, Lattimore, Mooresboro, Bostic, Kingstown, Spindale, Polkville and Cliffside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
